newsitem.title: CANADA: Cominco Ltd Q3 net profit sinks.
newsitem.headline: Cominco Ltd Q3 net profit sinks.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

Note: Nine months 1996 earnings include an after-tax gain from the sale of the Snip joint venture of C$19.3 million, or C$0.23 per common share. This period also includes an after-tax gain from the sale of Brilliant Dam of C$95.0 million, or C$1.12 per share.
